About
About
A lifelong learner with a diverse academic and professional journey.

I started with a foundation in Maths, Physics, and Chemistry, earned a Pharmacy degree, and then spent four years deeply immersed in UPSC preparation—gaining expertise in Polity, History, Economics, International Relations, Science & Tech, and Current Affairs. This experience not only expanded my knowledge but also sharpened my critical thinking, research, and problem-solving skills.

Beyond academics, I have worked in content strategy, SEO, and stakeholder engagement. I have experience in website content development, editing, and SEO optimization, ensuring clarity, brand alignment, and enhanced visibility. Additionally, I have worked on user research, market analysis, and cross-functional coordination to drive strategic decisions.

🔹 What Drives Me?
The joy of learning, meaningful conversations, and exploring new ideas.

🔹 What Excites Me?
Philosophy, Psychology, Biographies, History, Geopolitics, Mental Health, and Contemporary Issues.

With a strong foundation in communication, problem-solving, and adaptability, I thrive in dynamic environments that require analytical thinking and collaboration. I’m always eager to engage in thought-provoking discussions and contribute meaningfully to impactful projects.

Let’s connect! 🚀

✉️ gsrisowmya13@gmail.com
…see more

PeopleCues
PeopleCues
735 followers
735 followers
6-week review cycles were the norm. Until now.

At Angel One, performance reviews that once took 4–6 weeks now wrap up in just 2–4, and that shift means everything. Huge thanks to Angel One team for the kind words, and for recognizing what we truly care about:
📈 “You’ve moved the needle on the metrics that matter in a performance review.” –
🤖 “The AI-led SBI feedback engine has completely changed the quality of feedback.” –

It’s a reminder that meaningful change at work doesn’t need to be loud, just well-designed.
If a better review experience helps employees feel heard and managers make sharper decisions, we’re doing our job right.

What’s one underrated shift that’s made a big difference in your org? Comment below.



…more
1
Sri Sowmya Guddati
Sri Sowmya Guddati
   • 3rd+
Verified • 3rd+
Customer Success Manager @xto10x | BITS Pilani
Customer Success Manager @xto10x | BITS Pilani
1mo • Edited • 
 1 month ago • Edited • Visible to anyone on or off LinkedIn
🌟 Thrilled to begin a new journey with xto10x as a Customer Success Manager! 🌟

This isn’t just a new role—it’s a meaningful step toward doing the kind of work I truly care about: enabling growth, creating value, and being part of something bigger than myself.

Joining the PeopleCues team has been incredibly energizing. From day one, the PeopleCues team has been welcoming, thoughtful, and incredibly driven. The vision, the people, the culture—everything about it feels like the perfect environment to learn deeply, contribute meaningfully, and grow intentionally. I’m here to listen, to act, and to grow—not just for myself, but with the people and partners I get to work with every day. I’m excited to immerse myself in the product, collaborate with brilliant minds, and bring an action- and results-driven mindset to everything I do.

I’m especially grateful to everyone who’s supported me through this journey.
—thank you for believing in me and giving me this opportunity.
—thank you for your unwavering support and for making my onboarding experience so smooth and seamless.
And a huge thank you to, for being a constant pillar of encouragement and support through every twist and turn. Your presence has made a world of difference.

As I look ahead, I’m driven by the opportunity to make a real impact—by helping our customers succeed, building strong relationships, and contributing to the growth of the product and the company.

Here’s to learning, building, and growing—with intention and joy. The best is yet to come! 🚀
…more
